Package io.github.augustoravazoli.termenu.core

package io.github.augustoravazoli.termenu.core
Provides termenu core classes and annotations.
Since:
3.0.0
  • Class
    Description
    Menu
    The base class for all menus.
    Option
    Indicates that an annotated method is a menu option, such methods are used to define an action to be performed when the given option is chose.
    Title
    The title of a menu to be displayed.
